attributes.action: Instruct Carlisle Council to allow the proposed plans to expand Carlisle Airport and drop their list of unrealistic demands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the past few months,Andrew Tinkler, head of Eddie Stobart Haulage,has been in negotiations with Carlisle City Council over plans to expand the current Carlisle Airport.Today he has received notification from the council that he must meet a list of 50 conditions in order to receive the planning permission.The conditions are blocking the development/modernisation of our city. They must withdraw their conditions for the good of the City or this will lead to Stobarts relocating to Widness.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
